mapper.insert: insert into user(userPetName, userSignature, userPassword, userHeadSrc, userAddress, userIp, userPhone, vipGrade, userReputation, userIsUp, registTime, userCoin) values (#{userPetName}, #{userSignature}, #{userPassword}, #{userHeadSrc}, #{userAddress}, #{userIp}, #{userPhone}, #{vipGrade}, #{userReputation}, #{userIsUp}, #{registTime}, #{userCoin})
mapper.select: select * from user where userId = #{userId} limit 1
mapper.insert: insert into history values (#{userId}, #{contentType}, #{contentId}, #{viewDate}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE userId= values (userId), contentType= values (contentType), contentId= values (contentId), viewDate= values (viewDate)
